briefTitle: Effectiveness of Escitalopram in the Treatment of Body Dysmorphic Disorder
officialTitle: Pharmacotherapy Relapse Prevention in Body Dysmorphic Disorder
summary: This study's primary aim is to compare time to relapse and relapse rates in responders to acute escitalopram who are then randomized to placebo versus continuation treatment with escitalopram.

primaryOutcome.measure: Phase II Relapse of Body Dysmorphic Disorder (BDD) Symptoms (as Measured by the BDD-YBOCS)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Phase II: Biweekly for six months after randomization
